citeinfo.origin: Inst. Fish. And Oceanogr., Pac. Ocean Sci. Res., Kamchatka Div., Lab. Pelagic Fish
citeinfo.title: Larvae of Arctic shanny from the Sea of Okhotsk and Bering Sea

descript.abstract: The article describes larvae of arctic shanny Stichaeus punctatus from 9.9 to 22.4 mm long, which were caught in waters of the Sea of Okhotsk and Bering Sea near Kamchatka. Traits of the larvae are: number of myomeres about 55, anteanal distance approximately 40% of body length, small pectoral fin, and slanted pigment lines on the sides in the postanal part of the body.
descript.purpose: To report on the Larvae of Arctic shanny from the Sea of Okhotsk and Bering Sea
